thread.title: Pyongyang tells U.S. it's ready to talk denuclearization

title: Pyongyang tells U.S. it's ready to talk denuclearization
text:
Pyongyang tells U.S. it's ready to talk denuclearization 6:54am EDT - 01:53 
North Korea has told the United States for the first time that it is prepared to discuss the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula when North Korean leader Kim Jong Un meets President Donald Trump, according to a U.S. official. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
North Korea has told the United States for the first time that it is prepared to discuss the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula when North Korean leader Kim Jong Un meets President Donald Trump, according to a U.S. official.
